data.text: @christopherhope @tshep42 @Telegraph Typical of the Torygraph and the Tories to try and say Covid is over- it isnâ€™t . Only this morning We have been co-opted as emergency grandchild cover as child minder has Covid and has to close for 5 days. I think  practical evidence far better than Torygraph story!
@christopherhope @Telegraph ...And I don't just mean Johnson. https://t.co/f2hH3yvGU4
@christopherhope @Telegraph Where's the Torygraph's Putin-sponsored Russian propaganda supplement gone, Chopper?
@christopherhope @Telegraph So we can start the public inquiry then. Put that to the health secretary next time you interview him!

@christopherhope @Telegraph Good grief, cases up on last week and only going higher. Massive peak in Hong Kong with new variant. Johnson mired in corruption, lies and Russia money. Worst possible government
@christopherhope @Telegraph I guess there's little point if the government ignores them anyway.
@christopherhope @arobertsonphoto @Telegraph Take a trip to your local A&E and then tell me the crisis is over
@christopherhope @Telegraph https://t.co/q6kYjENU9u The government believes it over
@christopherhope @Telegraph But how will they wreck lives going forwards?
